alert.note: Alert for Adair (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 10:16PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Benton, Madison, Carroll, Washington and northeastern Adair Counties through 1100 PM CDT... At 1016 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles west of Roberson Hollow to 3 miles northeast of Wesley to 2 miles east of Westville. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Springdale... Berryville... Huntsville... Farmington... Prairie Grove... Green Forest... Elkins... Tontitown... West Fork... Lincoln... Westville... Greenland... Watts... Hindsville... Wesley... Carrollton... Rudd... Cincinnati... Forum... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 47 and 71. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
